page.title: 09CODDINGTON VILLAGE CONT.
page.content: The village has a Parochial Church Council and a representative on Bosbury Parish Council. The resident's main{social concern}was an objection to increasing traffic due to the arrival of the Petroleum Company, which has taken over nearby Coddington Court. Surrounding the village is{mixed {farmland.}The 16th Century Church Farm uses{wind pumps}to pump water from a stream on Woodfields Farm to store in its own man-made reservoir. Old Farm has just planted new{vineyards. Raven Hill Wood and Berrington Wood are the main wooded areas having mixed trees.
